00020 #ifndef _POSIX_THREAD_H
00021 #define _POSIX_THREAD_H
00022 
00023 #include "internal.h"
00024 
00025 typedef unsigned long long cobalt_sigset_t;
00026 
00027 struct mm_struct;
00028 
00029 struct cobalt_hkey {
00030         unsigned long u_tid;
00031         struct mm_struct *mm;
00032 };
00033 
00034 struct cobalt_hash {
00035         pthread_t k_tid;        /* Xenomai in-kernel (nucleus) tid */
00036         pid_t h_tid;            /* Host (linux) tid */
00037         struct cobalt_hkey hkey;
00038         struct cobalt_hash *next;
00039 };
00040 
00041 typedef struct {
00042         cobalt_sigset_t mask;
00043         xnpqueue_t list;
00044 } cobalt_sigqueue_t;
00045 
00046 struct cobalt_thread {
00047         unsigned magic;
00048         xnthread_t threadbase;
00049 
00050 #define thread2pthread(taddr) \
00051         ({                                                              \
00052                 xnthread_t *_taddr = (taddr);                           \
00053                 (_taddr                                                 \
00054                  ? ((xnthread_get_magic(_taddr) == COBALT_SKIN_MAGIC)   \
00055                     ? (container_of(_taddr, struct cobalt_thread, threadbase)) \
00056                     : NULL)                                             \
00057                  : NULL);                                               \
00058         })
00059 
00060 
00061         xnholder_t link;        /* Link in cobalt_threadq */
00062         xnqueue_t *container;
00063 
00064 #define link2pthread(laddr) container_of(laddr, struct cobalt_thread, link)
00065 
00066         pthread_attr_t attr;        /* creation attributes */
00067 
00068         /* For timers. */
00069         xnqueue_t timersq;
00070 
00071         /* Cached value for current policy. */
00072         int sched_policy;
00073 
00074         /* Monitor wait object and link holder. */
00075         struct xnsynch monitor_synch;
00076         struct xnholder monitor_link;
00077         int monitor_queued;
00078 
00079         struct cobalt_hkey hkey;
00080 };
00081 
00082 #define cobalt_current_thread() thread2pthread(xnpod_current_thread())
00083 
00084 #define thread_name(thread) ((thread)->attr.name)
00085 
00086 pthread_t cobalt_thread_find(const struct cobalt_hkey *hkey);
